bool AkFileSystemFlags::bIsAutomaticStream

True when the file is opened to be used as an automatic stream. Note that you don't need to set it. If you pass an AkFileSystemFlags to IAkStreamMgr CreateStd|Auto(), it will be set internally to the correct value.
